# Skills Standard Fixture

## Purpose

Standard skills directory structure based on Anthropic's skills repository format.

## Origin

Based on https://github.com/anthropics/skills structure.

## Structure

```
skills/
  test-skill-1/
    SKILL.md
  test-skill-2/
    SKILL.md
```

Two valid skills in the standard `skills/` directory layout.

## Test Use Cases

- Standard skills directory discovery
- Multiple skills in one repository
- Skill name validation (must match directory name)
- Basic skill metadata parsing
